poem_a_boy_in_the_universe: I am but a boy, brief spark wandering cosmos vast,
Chancing upon a seed of free will, unsurpassed.
Its origin, a mystery to ponder and explore,
Perhaps from great minds of present and lore.
Or maybe, a gift from the divine above,
I plant it here with care and love.
Hoping that you, as gods , will tend,
With water and light, its growth to mend.
May it survive, flourish, and triumph,
A testament to life's grand tale.
In this universe of endless night,
One small seed might bring new light.
thanks_letter_almworld_intro: Www.AllLivesMatter.World, in the spirit of 'All Lives Matter
Worldwide,' is a global call for world peace, advocating 'Love Is
The Way' - Kindness First, Fairness Always, and DUKI In Action.
stands for Decentralized Universal Kindness Income.

content_paragraphs: I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy. Your
remarkable rendition of 'O Come, O Come Emmanuel' is
featured as an anthem for the advocacy - embodying the world's
longing for peace and rejoicing.
Your masterpiece has been invaluable in helping launch this
initiative and enriching the content of the advocacy. I want to
personally reach out, inform you about this, and express my
thanks for your contribution.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy, which
was inspired by you rallying 'Black Lives Matter'(too). Your
movement has inspired the world, and the world, inspired by
your voice, has initiated the advocacy. This advocacy speaks for
all innocents trapped in tragic circumstances caused by evil and
injustice. It stands for those victimized by war, oppression, and
social conflict, as well as all who face injustice that they should
never have to.
Your movement has been invaluable in helping launch this
initiative and enriching the content of the advocacy. I want to
personally reach out, inform you about this, and express my
thanks for your contribution.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy. I was
deeply moved by your heart-touching and brave call for peace
during a CNN interview: 'I want everyone to stop dying. They're
dying.' Your words resonated profoundly with me and became the
direct catalyst for initiating this advocacy.
Your word and deed have been invaluable in helping launch this
initiative and enriching the content of the advocacy. I want to
personally reach out, inform you about this, and express my
thanks for your contribution.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to share with you a recently launched initiative that
resonates deeply with your profound call for 'A Shared Future
for Mankind.' Your vision of harmony and mutual respect has
guided this advocacy toward fostering a more peaceful and
compassionate world.
Your vision of unity amid divisions and harmony in diversity has
enriched this advocacy and given it direction. I wish to personally
share this with you and express my gratitude for the inspiration
your leadership has provided.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy. Your
'selfish gene' theory, when viewed at the species level, reinforces
the belief that we humans possess both selfish instincts and
moral duty to strive for peaceful unity rather than merciless
conflict. Our shared human genome carries instructions for this
collective 'selfishness,' which manifests as our drive to survive
and progress as a group.
Your insights have been invaluable in helping launch this
initiative and enriching the content of the advocacy. I want to
personally reach out, inform you about this, and express my
thanks for your contribution.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy. Your
discovery about how cooperative behaviors can emerge and
thrive, as detailed in your book 'The Evolution of Cooperation,'
have been a cornerstone of this advocacy. The emphasis on
kindness first and fairness always echoes the tit-for-tat strategy
for cooperation described in your work.
Your insights have been invaluable in helping launch and
enriching the content of the advocacy. I wanted to personally
reach out, inform you about this, and express my thanks for your
contribution.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy whose
ongoing success relies on a fundamental human right which you
are protecting now - 'freedom as the right to say no.' This freedom
to say no to authority, which requires those in power to prove
their authenticity rather than resorting to censorship or inaction,
is a foundational requirement in turning this advocacy's vision
into a global reality.
Your word and deed in protecting freedom has been invaluable in
helping launch and enriching the content of the advocacy. I
wanted to personally reach out, inform you about this, and
express my thanks for your contribution.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy, whose
ongoing success depends on empowering all lives worldwide to
live in freedom, to have the power to reject evil, do good, and
choose kindness. The concept of 'freedom as the power to say no,'
described in your work, is central to the advocacy's mission. This
power, decentralized in the form of DUKI (inspired by UBI), is
fundamental to making All Lives Matter World a reality.
Your inspiration has been invaluable in helping launch this
initiative and enriching the content of the advocacy. I wanted to
personally reach out, inform you about this, and express my
thanks for your contribution.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World. I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy, whose
ongoing success relies on a crucial foundation pioneered by your
WorldID work — a human passport for every person, fully private
using zero-knowledge proof, issued by decentralized true
authorities, owned by everyone, and unstoppable by anyone. I
truly hope that this human passport system can become a reality
and bring the advocacy vision to life.
Your work and inspiration have been invaluable in helping
launch and enriching the content of the advocacy. I wanted to
personally reach out, inform you about this, and express my
thanks for your contribution.
I hope this message finds you well. My name is KindKang, an
ordinary person advocating for AllLivesMatter.World, and I am
writing to tell you about this recently launched advocacy, whose
ongoing success relies on a fully zero-knowledge proof system
for proving unique humanness. Its technological feasibility is
elucidated by your wisdom: 'Everything that can be proven at all
can be proven in zero knowledge - not just some things, not
nothing, everything that can be proven can be proven in zero
knowledge.'
Your wisdom and inspiration have been invaluable in helping
launch and enriching the content of the advocacy. I wanted to
personally reach out, inform you about this, and express my
thanks for your contribution.
नेति नेति, Beacon of free will.
Unbounds Love, Unbinds Will
Vorstellung aus Wille.
Can you, sons of the Highest, feel it?
Veiled Kinship
Veiled Love and Veiled Will.
All Lives Should Matter.
Value all lives, thine and mine
Be Love, Be Fair Then Be Kind.
All Lives Indeed Matter.
Elevate all lives, ego tum mundus
Dare Wise, De Evil And Do Good.
Go Void
Recurse, curse, spiral down.
Be Beliefs
Bootstrap, strap, loop up.
Bootstrap, strap, loop up
